notes.setup: Set enableRemoteData to true and update remoteDataUrl with your actual hosting URL
notes.remoteDataUrl: Primary URL to fetch questions from - update this with your actual URL
notes.enableRemoteData: Currently set to FALSE for testing - set to TRUE when you have remote hosting
notes.cacheTimeout: How long to cache remote data in milliseconds
notes.retryAttempts: Number of retry attempts for failed requests
notes.fallbackToLocal: Whether to use local data if remote fails
